title: Out of sight, not out of mind: The effect of access to conservation sites on the willingness to pay for protecting endangered species
content:
Publication date: October 2024

Source: Ecological Economics, Volume 224

Author(s): Makarena Henríquez, Felipe Vásquez-Lavín, Manuel Barrientos, Roberto D. Ponce Oliva, Antonio Lara, Gabriela Flores-Benner, Carlos Riquelme
